attributes.action: The Prime Minister to dissolve parliament and call a General Election.
attributes.additional_details:
Failings:-

1. Failure to deal with Brexit in a way that respects the biggest democratic vote in a generation.
2. The continued underfunding of the NHS and nursing shortages
3. Failure to end austerity causing more and more people to use food banks and commit suicide
4. Continuation of the unacceptable MP expenses scandal at tax payers expense

The list is not exhaustive and crosses all 3 main parties wherein all 3 have failed the UK

The people demand their right to choose via General Election.
attributes.background:
This government has shown nothing but disdain and contempt for the electorate in so many ways that they now no longer represent the people.
From their ineptitude over Brexit to the mishandling of the NHS to showing no compassion to the poorest people in the country.
